What did I learn?

  • What is the correct syntax for a while loop?
    • A while loop must first have a method of stoping it so that it won't run in forever. For example, a variable that starts True and then you change it to False to stop the loop or when a variable gets to a certain size. Then you must have the actuall while loop statment with the break case. Then you indent and put the content of the while loop.
    • Here's an example:
      • myCase=0
      • while myCase < 10:
      • #code that gets loped
      • print(myCase)
      • myCase=myCase+1
  • What is a good use of remove in a program?
    • In my program one good use was removing the users favorite ice cream from the array of ice creams so the computer could pick a different one.
